name: Diagnose High Latency
description: RCA scenario to diagnose high latency issues in a checkout service by analyzing traces across multiple microservices.

context.description: Investigation metadata for checkout latency issue
context.value: {"notebookId":"rca-latency-001","metadata":{"dataSourceId":"7d03f9f5-b9c4-38d3-b888-751575bb49df","source":"Traces","index":"jaeger-span*","notebookType":"Agentic","initialGoal":"Investigate why checkout requests are experiencing high latency","timeField":"startTimeMillis","timeRange":{"selectionFrom":1763362800000,"selectionTo":1763363400000}}}

expectedTrajectory.description: Search for traces related to checkout service with high duration.
Analyze the trace spans to identify which service/operation is contributing to latency.
Correlate with logs to find any errors or warnings during the slow requests.
Present root cause hypothesis with supporting evidence from traces and logs.

name: Find Error Root Cause
description: RCA scenario to identify the root cause of 500 errors in a service.

expectedTrajectory.description: Search for logs with 500 error status codes to identify the scope and frequency.
Analyze error messages and stack traces to identify common patterns.
Correlate errors with deployment events, config changes, or upstream dependencies.
Present root cause with recommendations for resolution.

name: Service Dependency Analysis
description: RCA scenario to identify which service in a dependency chain is causing failures.

context.description: Investigation metadata for service failure analysis
context.value: {"notebookId":"rca-service-001","metadata":{"dataSourceId":"7d03f9f5-b9c4-38d3-b888-751575bb49df","source":"Traces","index":"otel-v1-apm-span*","notebookType":"Agentic","initialGoal":"Identify the failing service in the request chain","timeField":"startTimeMillis","timeRange":{"selectionFrom":1763362800000,"selectionTo":1763363400000}}}

expectedTrajectory.description: Search for spans with error status to identify which services are experiencing failures.
Analyze the service dependency chain to identify the originating failure point.
Check health metrics or logs of the identified failing service.
Present the failing service with evidence and potential causes.
